name: ImaginedLife
0:
”Alexa, open imagined life”
”Alexa, start imagined life”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: imagined life
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. 
Hail Emperor Garfield, In this story of imagined friends like Hobbes of unofficial Calvin and Hobbes, we visit our creative side of imagined life, swimming imagined fish, talking birds and animals and inquisitive wildlife and of course the maladopted imaginary life.
If you are bothered by any, we suggest, avatar therapy with designer stuffed toys.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
